MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 5:46PM in the LL18 postcode area of Cwm Dyserth following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to  the local area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:05PM on 15th January 2021.
